identity.philosophy: Fusion over Imitation. Emotion First. Content is King.

headings.usage: Main titles, Section headers. Use 'Soft' axis if available.

spacing.scale: Generous. Use p-8, p-12, p-24 for section gaps.

theme_toggle.name: CelestialSwitch
theme_toggle.specs: A pill-shaped toggle. Light mode shows a yellow sun with spinning rays. Dark mode shows a crescent moon with twinkling stars. Background transitions from Sky Blue to Midnight Blue.

elements: Background: Dynamic switch based on theme (Mountain Day / Ocean Night)

journey_line.description: A dashed SVG path that winds down the page, connecting sections.
journey_line.behavior: Draws itself as the user scrolls (ScrollTrigger/Framer Motion).

assets.icons: Lucide React (Feather icons). Use thin strokes (1.5px).

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. INSTALL FONTS: Add 'Fraunces' and 'Caveat' from Google Fonts to index.css.
2. SETUP THEME: Update tailwind.config.js to use the new color palette variables.
3. CREATE TOGGLE: Build the 'CelestialSwitch' component first. It's the core visual anchor.
4. BUILD LAYOUT: Use the 'Journey Line' concept to connect sections vertically.
5. USE IMAGES: Use the provided Pexels URLs for the hero and section backgrounds.
6. ANIMATION: Use framer-motion for the scroll-triggered journey line and entrance animations.
7. DO NOT use generic card layouts. Use the organic shapes defined in 'components.cards'.
universal_guidelines: Avoid 'AI Slop' aesthetics (generic gradients, centered text).
Add data-testid to all interactive elements.
